title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Styling Creme 4 oz
description: Instead of using a gel for hold and a polishing gloss for shine, now you can achieve both with one product: WEN Styling Crme. This creamy, softhold formula is designed to promote moisture, enhance shine and boost body. Even better: hair treated with this protective potion was up to 80% stronger against heat styling stress than untreated hair. *Tested against untreated hair.

title: WEN by Chaz Dean Sweet Almond Mint Re Moist Intensive Hair Treatment 4 oz
description: This treatment improves lackluster hair, giving it the ultimate moisturizing treatment, using the perfect blend of natural and botanical extracts to restore hair to a much healthier state. WEN Re-Moist Hydrating Mask is a universal treatment to maintain healthy hair and scalp, providing moisture, shine, and nutrients to give you an at-home spa treatment that will leave your hair feeling soft and silky.
